Interface EventService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface EventService

      • updateEvent

        boolean updateEvent​(java.lang.String head,
                    java.lang.String desc,
                    java.sql.Date startDate,
                    java.sql.Date enddate,
                    java.sql.Date regStart,
                    java.sql.Date regEnd,
                    java.lang.String coordName,
                    java.lang.String poster_Path,
                    int id)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        update Event attributes in database given Event ID as one of the input parameter
        Parameters:
        head - Headline
        desc - Description
        startDate - Start date of event
        enddate - End date of event
        regStart - Start date of registration
        regEnd - End date of registration
        coordName - Coordinator name
        poster_Path - path of file saved
        id - Event ID
        Returns:
        boolean value based on successful operation or not ?
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
